type.name: relationship_select
type.description: A relationship_select is a relationship for which cardinality is specified.

entity.name: cardinality_of_related_class
entity.description: A cardinality_of_related_class is an maths_space_context that is a Cardinality_of_related_class (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: physical_space
explicit.description: the relationship for which the maths_space is the allowed cardinality.

entity.name: cardinality_of_relating_class
entity.description: A cardinality_of_relating_class is an maths_space_context that is a Cardinality_of_relating_class (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: physical_space
explicit.description: the relationship for which the maths_space is the allowed cardinality.
